            $firstName: String,

            $password: String,

              $userStatus: String,
              $isBan: Int

{
            updateRider(
              id: $id
              firstName: $firstName
              lastName: $lastName
              email:$email
              password: $password
              phoneDialCode: $phoneDialCode
              phoneNumber: $phoneNumber
              userStatus: $userStatus
              isBan: $isBan
              phoneCountryCode: $phoneCountryCode
            )
            {
              status
              errorMessage
            }
          }

}

      tag

    }
  }
}
